title: Failed to set cuDNN stream
body:
Hi iperov!
Couldn't wait to test 2.0 on a mining rig to see how cool is the multi-gpu training.
I use aligned src and dst from 1.0.
Here the result:

2Appuyez sur une touche pour continuer...
